page.title: 16SCHOOLS IN GT.YARNMOUTH
page.content: ALDERMAN SWINDELL FIRST SCHOOL,NEWTOWN,GT.YARMOUTH When we paid a visit, we noticed that it hadn't changed very much since we left 5 years ago. As we arrived it was break time and the pupils were playing in the playground. They were playing 'Kisscat','Stuck-in-the-mud',& 'Touchy'.There were also empty Car Tyres to play on. At the end of break the handbell was rung for the children to return to their lessons. During lunchtime at the school, many of the pupils bring a packed lunch as School Dinners are becoming quite expensive. Looking at the school now, the outside appearance is just as it was when built 56 years ago, & it would be interesting to know if it will stay the same in the future.
